short_summary: Heavy Haul Trailer Weld Inspection on 8 trailers
description: Weld inspection for 8 trailers with option for 4 additional
full_summary:
### Notice of Tender

#### *English Summary*

The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to select a service provider to perform commercial testing laboratory services for the inspection of welds on heavy haul trailers. This tender is a requirement for the department to ensure the reliability and integrity of its transportation assets.
